SEARCH
Module Actividad_AE02
Package utils

Class CsvProcessor

java.lang.Object
utils.CsvProcessor
public class CsvProcessor extends Object
The CsvProcessor class provides methods for processing CSV files, interacting with a database, and generating XML content. It reads CSV data, inserts it into a database, and generates XML representations of the data.

This class handles the conversion of CSV data into database entries and XML content for further processing.

    • processCsvAndGenerateXml

      public void processCsvAndGenerateXml(String filePath)
      Reads a CSV file, creates the necessary table in the database, inserts rows into the database, and generates corresponding XML content for each row.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the CSV file to be processed.

    • readCsv

      public List<String[]> readCsv(String filePath) throws IOException
      Reads the CSV file and returns a list of rows where each row is represented as an array of strings.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the CSV file to be read.
      Returns:
      A list of string arrays representing the rows of the CSV file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

    • insertRowToDatabase

      public void insertRowToDatabase(String[] row)
      Inserts a row of data into the population table in the database.
      Parameters:
      row - The row of data to be inserted into the database.
